justification: “The Exemplar-Based Random Walk (EBRW) model formalizes category decisions as an evidence accumulation process.”
“we interrogate neural signals related to decision making with a hierarchical variant of the drift diffusion model (DDM), a computational model that approximates EBRW's decision making mechanism.”

measured_by: Drift rate parameter of the DDM
justification: “we focus on the drift rate parameter in the DDM” because EBRW “formalizes that category representations impact decision making through changes to the rate of evidence accumulation.”
“we generated predictions of category evidence with the GCM (Nosofsky, 1986)” to link model-based evidence with neural activation.

measured_by: Trial-level fMRI BOLD beta estimates within Schaefer parcellation ROIs
justification: “trial-level beta parameters were estimated from the functional timeseries across the whole brain… These beta estimates across trials were averaged within 100 regions of interest.”
